name: Ancient Shortsword
effect: *This old sword was manufactured before the Heian period, and eventually converted into an Artificial Regalia. It's more suited to stab than slash.*While [Equipped], once per round, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Shinano Toshiro
effect: *A famous dagger, converted into an Artificial Regalia. The unique type of spirit energy within grants the user unusual agility.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Evasion} check.

name: Hirano Toshiro
effect: *A famous dagger, converted into an Artificial Regalia. The unique type of spirit energy within grants the user heightened attack power.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Accuracy} check.

name: Atsushi Toshiro
effect: *A famous dagger, converted into an Artificial Regalia. As it's name suggests, it was constructed with strong materials.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 to [Armor].

name: Goto Toshiro
effect: *A famous dagger, converted into an Artificial Regalia. The energy within it grants it anti-magic power.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 to [Barrier].

name: Ritual Kopis
effect: *A small sword used in ancient times, converted into an Artificial Regalia recently. Used by mages for spell ceremonies.*While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Magical Damage].

name: Midare Toshiro
effect: A famous sword used in ancient times, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It contains a spiritial power that disrupts its enemies.While [Equipped], once per combat, the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] takes -2 to their {Evasion} check.

name: Maeda Toshiro
effect: A famous sword used in ancient times, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It absorbs spiritual power and stores it for release.While [Equipped], once per combat when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Akita Toshiro
effect: A famous sword used in ancient times, converted into an Artificial Regalia. The sword resonates on a unique wavelength of spiritual energy, allowing it to exert spirit energy more efficiently.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Accuracy} check.

name: Hakata Toshiro
effect: A famous sword used in ancient times, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It brings a blessing to those who are engaged in combat.While [Equipped], once per session, [Recover] 10 HP before [Damage Reduction].

name: Aizen Kunitoshi
effect: An Artificial Regalia created during the Kamakura period. It is said that the warrior Aizen, whose name is carved on the grip, grants the user his luck.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +1 to an {Evasion} check.

name: Claymore
effect: A longsword-type Artificial Regalia used by the highlanders. It boasts high power, augmented by its user's spiritual energy.While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +1 [Physical Rank] when making an [Attack].

name: Kenben
effect: *A special sword-type Artificial Regalia used in ancient China. It extends via a chain inside of it, allowing it to make attacks at range.*While [Equipped], once per round, change the [Range] of a [Physical Attack] to [Range: 3 Sq.].

name: Gokotai no Tsurugi
effect: *A famous shortsword, converted into an Artificial Regalia.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain +10 [Armor] against a [Target: 2#+ (Including Area or Combat Zone)] [Physical Attack].

name: Nikkari Aoe
effect: *A wakizashi Artificial Regalia used in the North/South dynasty era. Legend has it that it once killed a powerful ghost.*While [Equipped], gain +1 [Physical Rank] when making an [Attack Action] on [Type: Undead / Mechanical] enemies.

name: Sayo Samonji
effect: A famous shortsword Artificial Regalia that brings good fortune to its user.While [Equipped], once per combat, reroll the result of an {Accuracy} [Roll] (Except for a critical or fumble).

name: Ima no Tsurugi
effect: An artificial regalia crafted from a famous dagger. Its spiritual power is as strong as a guardian sword.While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 [Barrier].

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu
effect: *A famous sword, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It contains such a high level of spiritual energy that it cannot be countered without heavy weaponry.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Light] on [Physical Attacks].

name: Yagen Toshiro
effect: A famous sword, converted into an Artificial Regalia. Its blade contains the power to make terrible wounds.While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack].

name: Souza Samonji
effect: *A famous sword made into an Artificial Regalia. It brings good luck to those who possess it.*While [Equipped], once per combat, reroll the result of an {Evasion} [Roll] (Except for a fumble).

name: Samurai Nodachi
effect: An Artificial Regalia made from a dangerous sword used in the Warring States era. It boasts sharpness that can cut through steel.While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack].

name: Hitokirigatana
effect: *The sword of Tsujigiri, which was rampant during the Edo period. It increases its sharpness by drinking blood.*While [Equipped], once per round when making a [Physical Attack], the user may lose 2 {HP} and gain +5 [Physical Damage].

name: Nakigitsune
effect: An Artificial Regalia used in the Kamakura period. Legend has it that it was used to cut down Youkai.While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Beast - Insectoid], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Taikogane Sadamune
effect: A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. The energy within the sword brings power to its holder.While [Equipped], once per combat, adjust one [Spirit Dice] by 1 (Cannot go lower than 1 or higher than 6).

name: Fudou Yukimitsu
effect: *A famous Wazakashi converted into an Artificial Regalia. The ornate markings on the blade provide the power of flames.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 2 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Kashuu Kiyomitsu
effect: *A famous sword that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. It was particularly well-known at the end of the Edo period, and has excellent attack power.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 [Damage] when making a [Physical Attack].

name: Monoyoshi Sadamune
effect: *A famous Wazakashi that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. It brings strategic military luck to its owner.*While [Equipped], once per session, change one [Spirit Dice] to either a [3] or a [4].

name: Yamato No Kamiyasusada
effect: *A famous sword that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. It was widely used at the end of the Edo period*While [Equipped], once per round, reduce the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] by 5.

name: Kasen Kanesada
effect: *A famous sword that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. It boasts high killing power against humanoids.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid ], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Horikawa Kunihiro
effect: *A specially-made Artificial Regalia. Despite being more than two feet long, it is especially lethal despite being made for one-handed use.*While [Equipped], once per combat, treat a [Physical Attack] as a [Special Attack].

name: Urashima Kotetsu
effect: *A specially-made Artificial Regalia. An image of Urashima Taro is carved on the side of the blade, granting its user the power of time manipulation.*While [Equipped], once per combat, gain [+2d6] to [Initiative].

name: Jiroutachi
effect: *A huge, sword-type Artificial Regalia manufactured at the end of the Sengoku Period. Despite its size, it's graceful and sharp.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Armor] of the target of a [Physical Attack].

name: Shishiou
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. Because of its age, it has accumulated massive spiritual power over the years.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Beast - Mythic], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Nagasone Kotetsu
effect: *An Artificial Regalia from the Edo period. It's said that it boasts sharpness so high that it is able to cut through stone lanterns.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Yamabushi Kunihiro
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. The characters carved into the blade bring the power of a demon to its user.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to Non-[Boss] mononoke by 10.

name: Taroutachi
effect: *A huge, sword-type Artificial Regalia manufactured at the end of the Sengoku Period. Despite its size, it's graceful and sharp.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] the [Armor] of the target of a [Physical Attack].

name: Kogitsunemaru
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. This powerful, sacred vessel contains the protection of Inari.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Recover] 20 [HP] before [Damage Reduction].

name: Akishi Kuneyuki
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. This beautiful blade is filled with overflowing spiritual power.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to [x#] mononoke by 15.

name: Senji Muramasa
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. The energy within the blade has a special effect on Godhunters.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to [Godhunters] by 10.

name: Kikkou Sadamune
effect: A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. Carvings of a kikkou chrysanthemum on its blade bring devilish spiritual power to its user.*While [Equipped], reduce [Physical Damage] received from non-[Boss] mononoke by 5.

name: Uguisumaru
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. A huge amount of spiritual power dwells in the blade.*While [Equipped], once per round when performing [Damage Calculation] with a [Style Talent], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Hotarumaru
effect: An Odachi Artificial Regalia used in the North/South dynasty era. When spirit energy is pushed through it, it emits a light like a firefly.While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Kousetsu Samonji
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. It augments the intelligence of its user.*While [Equipped], once per scene, gain +7 to an {Intellect} check.

name: Ishikirimaru
effect: A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia, used in the Heian period. It tears through its targets, whether or not they're corporeal or not.While [Equipped], when performing [Physical Attack] on [Type: Undead - Chaos], increase [Physical Rank] by 1.

name: Tsurumaru
effect: A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia, which changed hands numerous times. It contains a unique power that has been touched by many.While [Equipped], increase the [Target] of your [Physical Attacks] by 1#.

name: Izuminokami Kanesada
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia, used in the North/South dynasty era. Its shiny, silver blade boasts strange strength and tenacity.*While [Equipped], increase [Armor] By +5.

name: Mutsu no Kamiyoshiyuki
effect: *A famous Artificial Regalia used by the godhunter Sakamoto Ryoma near the end of the Edo period. The blade contains a spiritual power that can strengthen its user's when needed.*While [Equipped], once per combat, when making a [Physical Attack], gain +2 [Rank].

name: Heshikiri Hasebe
effect: *This Artificial Regalia was put into storage for a long time after it was manufactured.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0). Also, once per round, destroy an adjacent [Obstacle].

name: Kumokiri
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. It has powerful effects on chaotic monsters.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Beast - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Shokudaikiri Mitsutada
effect: *This Artificial Regalia boasts excellent sharpness. It received its name when its owner cut through a candlestick.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Sohayanshiruki
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia. It has the spiritual power to reject the will of its opponent.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from [Godhunters] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Murasame
effect: *A famous sword converted into an Artificial Regalia, with a dragon carved into its blade.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Cold] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 3 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Ichigo Hitofuri Yoshimitsu
effect: *A masterpiece blade made by a master craftsman, Yoshimitsu. It allows its user to resist spellcraft.*While [Equipped], gain +5 to [Barrier].

name: Daihannya Nagamitsu
effect: *This Artificial Regalia is said to be the work of a master craftsman, Nagamitsu. A beautiful blade that boasts high power and tremendous tenacity.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Halve] received [Magic Damage].

name: Ookurikara Hiromitsu
effect: *This Artificial Regalia has been nicknamed the Dokugan-Ryu, and has a carving of a dragon with a sword on it.*While [Equipped], gain +5 to [Armor].

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro
effect: *This Artificia Regalia was created as a copy of a legendary blade called the Yamanbagiri.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Plant - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Mikazuki Munechika
effect: *An Artificial Regalia created during the Heian period. This powerful, valuable sword bears the name and shape of the crescent moon.*While [Equipped], gain +5 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Kogarasumaru
effect: *A powerful Tachi Artificial Regalia that contains the power of Hachiman. It was created during the Genpei war.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Beast - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Goro Nyudo Masamune
effect: *An Artificial Regalia created from one of the most powerful blades in the world. It has the power to repel evil spirits.*While [Equipped], reduce [Damage] received from [Aramitama] by 10.

name: Rochin
effect: *An old spear used in the kingdom of Ryukyu. They're used alongside Tinbe.*While [Equipped] at the same time as [Tinbe], gain +2 to {Initiative}.

name: Master's Spear
effect: *A Spear-type Artificial Regalia, created by a master craftsman who used all of his strength. It has a beautiful shape, and is easy to use.*While [Equipped], once per round, the [Target] of an [Attack Action] gains a -1 modifier to {Evasion}.

name: Warrior's Hoko
effect: *A spear said to have once been used by a hero of the Three Kingdoms era. This Artificial Regalia features excellent durability and destructive power.*While [Equipped], once per combat, change the [Range] of an [Attack Action] to [Area].

name: Exorcist's Greatspear
effect: *A large, spiritually purified spear Artificial Regalia. It destroys evil beings with a spiritual power like the sun.*While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Oni Horn Longspear
effect: *An especially long spear with an Oni's horn at its tip. It has high penetrative force.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Otegine
effect: *A specially made, customized longspear. The tip of this Artificial Regalia contains devastating power.*While [Equipped], once per round, change the [Range] of an [Attack Action] to [Area].

name: Iwatooshi
effect: *A famous Naganita that was turned into an Artificial Regalia. It grants its user enourmous tenacity.*While [Equipped], gain +10 [Armor].

name: Tonbokiri
effect: *A famous Naganita that was turned into an Artificial Regalia. It is said that it once cut a dragonfly that landed on its edge. It boasts tremendous killing power.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 10.

name: Hinomoto-Go
effect: *A famous greatspear that was turned into an Artificial Regalia. This powerful sacred spear was also used as a shrine.*While [Equipped], gain +10 {Barrier}.

name: Bronze Battleaxe
effect: *A ritual axe that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. Once used in Ancient China, it boasts high spiritual and cutting power.*While [Equipped], once per combat, when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Labrys
effect: *This double-edged axe was once used in ancient greece before being converted into an Artificial Regalia. It contains massive, destructive power.*While [Equipped], once per combat, when making a [Physical Attack], gain +10 to [Damage].

name: Large Chakram
effect: *A giant chakram, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It's too big to be spun with one's hands, and needs to be rotated with the user's entire body.*  While [Equipped], once per round, change [Range / Target] to [7 Sq. / 1#].

name: Scottish Maiden
effect: *A European guillotine converted for portable use. Its huge blade slams directly into its targets.*  While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] mononoke by 10.

name: Silver Axe of Hermes
effect: *A replica of a silver axe once used by the god Hermes. This Artificial Regalia contains powerful spirit energy.*  While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Undead - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Raijin's Battleaxe
effect: *A replica of a powerful weapon used by the thunder gods. This Artificial Regalia contains high power.*  While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Demon-Subduing Spade
effect: *An Axe-type Artificial Regalia with a massive, crescent moon-shaped blade. This rare weapon is loved by a certain Sakimitama.*  While [Equipped], once per Session, set the [Armor] of the [Target] of a [Physical Attack] to 0.

name: Golden Axe of Hermes
effect: *A replica of a golden axe once used by the god Hermes. This Artificial Regalia contains tremendous attack power.*  While [Equipped], when making [Physical Attacks] against [Class: Humanoid - Undead - Chaos], gain +1 [Physical Rank].

name: Apocalypse Scythe
effect: *A replica of a Scythe carried by the fourth horseman, transformed into an Artificial Regalia.*  While [Equipped], once per combat, roll 1d6, and if the result is any other than a "1", inflict [Dead] on any one non-[Boss] non-[Aramitama] [Mononoke].

name: Steel Fan
effect: *A sturdy Iron fan, made into an Artificial Regalia. It grants its user excellent defense.*While [Equipped], gain +2 to [Armor].

name: Attack Shield
effect: *A large shield, converted into an Artificial Regalia and modified for offensive purposes.*While [Equipped], gain +2 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Bronze Automaton
effect: *A bronze doll used in ancient China. To use it as a weapon, the user climbs on its back and manipulate it with their spirit energy.*While [Equipped], treat as though [Equipped] with [Unarmed].

name: Warlord's Kanabo
effect: *This Kanabo is an Artificial Regalia used by warriors and warlords during the Sengoku era. It boasts high power.*While [Equipped], [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 5 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Divine Shield
effect: *A large shield, converted into an into an offensive Artificial Regalia. It's capable of converting the user's mental strength into defensive power.*While [Equipped], gain +3 to [Armor] and [Barrier].

name: Bludgeon
effect: *An ancient, sacred club that was once drenched in lots blood, and gained power from it. Its spirit energy crushes the weak.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to [x#] [Mononoke] by 10.

name: Priestly Mace
effect: *A Mace used by high-ranking priests and other holy figures. It brings dignity to its owner.*While [Equipped], once per scene, gain +7 to a {Willpower} check.

name: Pillar of Flame
effect: *An Artificial Regalia created from an Iron pillar used for executions, or torture.*While [Equipped], bestow [Element: Fire] on [Physical Attacks]. Also, [Targets] reduce their [Armor] by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Hero's Club
effect: *A replica of a club used by ancient heroes. It has special effects on various monsters.*While [Equipped], increase [Physical Damage] to non-[Boss] [Mononoke] by 10.

name: Kendama Gun
effect: *A Kendama-Type Artificial Regalia that launches a huge iron ball at high speed. It's easy to handle, and often used for self-defense.*While [Equipped], once per session, increase [Physical Damage] by 5.

name: Swift Horse
effect: *A famous horse that became a contracted beast with spiritual power.*While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves].

name: Matchlock Gun
effect: *A Matchlock gun, alongside its black powder, and bullets. All three components of this weapon were converted into Artificial Regalia.*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Physical Rank]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Animal Vehicle
effect: *A dog or lion-shaped vehicle that was converted into an Artificial Regalia.*While [Equipped], gain a +2 Modifier to the result of [Appearance] Checks. Also, the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves].

name: Warrior's Greatbow
effect: *A large bow used by medieval warriors and archers, converted into an Artificial Regalia. It takes a lot of skill to master.*While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Start] before making an [Attack Action], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Flintlock Gun
effect: *A Matchlock gun modified into a Flintlock. This Artificial Regalia features high reliability and power.*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Physical Rank]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Hero's Favored Horse
effect: *A Bound Steed once favored by many different heroes.*While [Equipped], the user is able to make [Ranged Attacks] and [Magical Attacks] after [Combat Moves].

name: Cannon
effect: *A Cannon, made into an Artificial Regalia. It can also be used as a siege weapon.*While [Equipped], when making a [Physical Attack], gain +1 [Physical Rank]; however, this [Weapon] may only be used to make a [Physical Attack] once per round.

name: Apocalypse Greatbow
effect: *A replica of the Greatbow carried by the first knight, transformed into an Artificial Regalia. It holds a terrible power.*While [Equipped], by spending 1x [Start] before making an [Attack Action], gain +1 [Rank].

name: Mystic Magatama
effect: *A large magatama used for magic or rituals. They contain boundless spiritual energy.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +10 to a [Recovery] effect.

name: Digital Blaster
effect: *An electronic, magical Personal Defense Weapon based on the MP5. The data generated by its spell program can be turned into spiritual bullets.*While [Equipped], gain +5 to [Recovery] effects.

name: Witch's Familiar
effect: *A familiar created by Witch's secret spells, that underwent a process to become an Artifical Regalia. Their appearance varies, but they have high combat ability.*While [Equipped], once per combat, when performing a [Magic Attack], gain +1 [Magic Rank].

name: Treasure Bell
effect: *A special, metal bell created with a unique metal that resembles bronze. By filling it with spirit energy, it plays a mysterious sound.*While [Equipped], once per combat, change the [Target] of a [Magical Attack] to [Area].

name: Escort Golem
effect: *A huge Mud Golem Artificial Regalia created by secret Kabbalah spells.*While [Equipped], once per round, gain +5 to [Armor].

name: Ancient Instruments
effect: *Instruments once used by ancient magicians, turned into Artificial Regalia. They emit powerful sounds when played.*While [Equipped], once per round, change the [Target] of a [Magic Attack] to [Area].

name: Sephirot Scroll
effect: *An ancient scroll from the tree of life, made into an Artificial Regalia.*While [Equipped], once per combat, [Recover] 20 [HP] before [Damage Reduction].

name: Crystal Skull
effect: *This Artificial Regalia was created from a Crystal Skull, once used for magic. It accumulates and releases huge amounts of spirit energy.*While [Equipped], once per session, change the [Range] of a [Magic Attack] to [Combat Zone].

name: Great Holy Grail
effect: *A replica of the Holy Grail, an object which has appeared in many legends, that was converted into an Artificial Regalia. While it's a mere replica, it still holds mighty spiritual power.*While [Equipped], increase [Recovery] effects from [Talents] targetting the user by 10.
